content.question: Find the rate of change, in km/hr, of the distance between the two ships when x = 4 km and y = 3 km.

frqParts.text: Find the rate of change, in km/hr, of the distance between the two ships when x = 4 km and y = 3 km.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
